languages.text: {n}Ксавьер кивает на почтительно поднесенную слугой грамоту.{/n} "Это — свидетельство дарованных вам чрезвычайных полномочий. Я рассчитываю на ваш успех, {name}".

{n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксавьер кивает на почтительно поднесенную слугой грамоту.{/n} "Это — свидетельство дарованных вам чрезвычайных полномочий. Я рассчитываю на ваш успех, {name}".

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎看着他的仆人恭恭敬敬地递上来的文件，点点头。{/n}“这份文件赋予了你无与伦比的权力，这些权力都可以为你所用。我期待着你的捷报，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎看着他的仆人恭恭敬敬地递上来的文件，点点头。{/n}“这份文件赋予了你无与伦比的权力，这些权力都可以为你所用。我期待着你的捷报，{name}。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar asiente en dirección al papel que su sirviente ha traído a la mesa.{/n} «Este documento detalla los extraordinarios poderes que le han sido conferidos. Cuento con que cumpla su cometido, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar asiente en dirección al papel que su sirviente ha traído a la mesa.{/n} «Este documento detalla los extraordinarios poderes que le han sido conferidos. Cuento con que cumpla su cometido, {name}».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは、彼の従者が机の上へと恭しく運んできた書面に向かってうなずく。{/n}「この文書は並外れた権力を保証するものだ。これ以降自由に振るうがよい。お前の成功を期待しているぞ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは、彼の従者が机の上へと恭しく運んできた書面に向かってうなずく。{/n}「この文書は並外れた権力を保証するものだ。これ以降自由に振るうがよい。お前の成功を期待しているぞ、{name}」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar indique du menton le papier que son serviteur vient de poser respectueusement sur la table.{/n} « Ce document atteste des pouvoirs extraordinaires dont vous disposez désormais. Je n'attends rien de moins que votre succès, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar indique du menton le papier que son serviteur vient de poser respectueusement sur la table.{/n} « Ce document atteste des pouvoirs extraordinaires dont vous disposez désormais. Je n'attends rien de moins que votre succès, {name}. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar nickt in Richtung des Papiers, das sein Diener respektvoll zum Tisch gebracht hat.{/n} "Dieses Dokument bestätigt die außergewöhnlichen Rechte, die Euch nun zur Verfügung stehen. Ich baue auf Euren Erfolg, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar nickt in Richtung des Papiers, das sein Diener respektvoll zum Tisch gebracht hat.{/n} "Dieses Dokument bestätigt die außergewöhnlichen Rechte, die Euch nun zur Verfügung stehen. Ich baue auf Euren Erfolg, {name}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, hizmetkârının masaya saygıyla bıraktığı kâğıda bakıp baş sallıyor.{/n} "Bu kâğıt, artık elinde bulundurduğun olağanüstü imkânların bir belgesidir. Başarılı olacağından şüphem yok {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar nods at the paper that his servant has deferentially delivered to the table.{/n} "This document attests to the extraordinary powers you now have at your disposal. I am counting on your success, {name}."
